TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IntranetZoneCredentialPolicy extends System.Object implements class System.Net.ICredentialPolicy

summary.span: 對於使用 與其衍生類別 (Derived Class) 所產生的資源要求，定義其使用的認證原則。

span.span: Defines a credential policy to be used for resource requests that are made using and its derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此原則可讓傳送只要求的資源是否在提出要求的用戶端與位於相同網域的認證。This policy allows credentials to be sent only if the requested resource is in the same domain as the client that is making the request. 許多應用程式，這是最佳的原則，因為會防止要求傳送的資源不在內部網路上的網路認證。For many applications this is the optimal policy because it prevents network credentials from being sent with requests for resources that are not on the intranet. > [!NOTE] > 只有當叫用原則或關聯與要求有未認證`null`。 policies are invoked only if the or the that is associated with the request has credentials that are not `null`. 設定此原則會有不會影響未指定認證的要求。Setting this policy has no effect on requests that do not specify credentials. 使用屬性來設定原則。Use the property to set the policy. 處理驗證要求將會叫用方法，然後再執行驗證。The that handles authentication for the request will invoke the method before performing the authentication. 如果要求的資源在不同的網域用戶端，方法會傳回`false`，而且不會執行驗證。If the requested resource is in a different domain than the client, the method returns `false`, and authentication is not performed. 這個原則影響的所有執行個體具有目前的應用程式網域中的非 null 認證。This policy affects all instances of with non-null credentials in the current application domain. 無法覆寫原則，在個別的要求。The policy cannot be overridden on individual requests. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立執行個體並使用它來設定認證原則的應用程式定義域。The following code example demonstrates creating an instance of and using it to set the credential policy for the application domain. [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool ShouldSendCredential (Uri challengeUri, System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.NetworkCredential credential, System.Net.IAuthenticationModule authModule);

Public Overridable Function ShouldSendCredential (challengeUri As Uri, request As WebRequest, credential As NetworkCredential, authModule As IAuthenticationModule) As Boolean
public: virtual bool ShouldSendCredential(Uri ^ challengeUri, System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::NetworkCredential ^ credential, System::Net::IAuthenticationModule ^ authModule);

returns.span: 如果要求的資源與產生要求的用戶端在相同的網域，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the requested resource is in the same domain as the client making the request; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式沒有直接; 呼叫這個方法呼叫此方法，負責執行伺服器驗證。Applications do not call this method directly; it is called by the that is responsible for performing authentication with the server. 如果此方法傳回`false`、將不會驗證用戶端到伺服器。If this method returns `false`, the will not authenticate the client to the server. 會呼叫這個方法只會針對要求指定的認證或不使用物件，指定認證。This method is called only for requests that specify credentials or use a object that specifies credentials. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範衍生自允許安全超文字傳輸通訊協定 」 (HTTPS) 使用基本驗證的要求傳送認證。The following code example demonstrates deriving from to allow credentials to be sent for requests that use Secure Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTPS) with basic authentication. 使用 HTTPS 和基本驗證，才能透過網路傳送加密的使用者密碼。Using HTTPS and basic authentication, the user password is encrypted before being sent over the network. [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#4)]
